answers.answer: hi, yes diabetes can cause digestive disorders because your pancreas plays a large role in digestion, a colonoscopy would have shown if you had crohns, although not all inflammatory bowl disease shows up with this.you might gluten intolerant or lactose intolerant also allergies to certain foods or spices might be responsible like seeds and peppers. try cutting out some foods from your diet to determine this. cheers.
